articles.title: CES convention may have spread coronavirus throughout the US — and world - PRI
articles.description: The Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas has become an intriguing puzzle piece of the pandemic's spread after new Bay Area COVID-19 deaths indicate the virus' presence in the United States earlier than thought.
articles.content:

articles.title: This AI's only function is to draw penises - Boing Boing
articles.description: DICK-RNN is a recurrent neural network trained with 10,000 doodles of dicks. You start drawing a shape and the AI tries its best to finish it as a penis. Starting with the balls helps a lot. Try it…
